import React, { Component } from 'react' import ResponsiveNavBar from "../Partials/Header" import axios from 'axios' export default class OfferPage extends Component { constructor(){ super() this.state={ id:new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get('id'), offer: {}, depart: "", dest: " ", date: [], mindate: [], nombre_places: 0, prix: 0, time: new Date(), HMS:[], } } componentDidMount=()=>{ this.fetchOffer() } fetchOffer = () => { axios({ method: "GET", url: "http://127.0.0.1:8080/EJB-Client/APIv1.0/annonces/"+this.state.id, headers: { "Content-Type": "Application/json"}, }).then((res) => { if(res.status===200){ let[h,mm,s] =res.data.time.split("T")[1].split('Z')[0].split(":") let [y,m,d] =res.data.time.split("T")[0].split("-") let time=new Date(y,m,d,h,mm,s).getTime() console.log(time) this.setState({ offer: res.data, depart: res.data.ville_depart, dest: res.data.ville_arrivee, date: res.data.date_depart.split('Z')[0].split("-"), mindate: res.data.date_depart.split('Z')[0].split("-"), nombre_places: res.data.nombre_places, prix: res.data.prix, time: new Date(res.data.time.split("T")[0]+" "+res.data.time.split("T")[1].split("Z")[0]), HMS: res.data.time.split("T")[1].split('Z')[0].split(":") }) }}); } bookOffer=()=>{ } render() { console.log(this.state.time.toLocaleString()) console.log(this.state.date) // } return (
{/* Site header */}

{this.state.offer.ville_depart}

------------------------

{this.state.offer.ville_arrivee}

{this.state.offer.prix} DH
{this.state.date[0]+"/"+this.state.date[1]+"/"+(parseInt(this.state.date[2])+1)}
{this.state.time.toLocaleString().split(",")[1]}

{this.state.offer.nombre_places}

Size

38.2

Book a place in this ride
) } }
